format: Beijing Capital International Airport information [{code}], {publish_time} [UTC], runway {dep_oprt}{dep_info}, runway {arr_oprt}{arr_info}{weather}{DCL}{windshear}{freq}{extra}please set transponder on mode [S] while taxiing, if full runway length for departure is needed, advise when request ATC clearance, [RNAV] departures and arrivals are available, advise on initial contact you have information [{code}], and confirm you will comply [RNAV] procedures.
